document.text:
Ann Lundberg 
Subject: RE: questionnaires 
Date: Sat, 13 Nov 2021 23:08:15 +0000 
Attachments: 2021-11-13 joint_letter regarding_ juror questionnaires.pdf 
Laura, 
Attached is a draft of the joint letter. Please note that we've joined the defense's position with respect to the prospective 
jurors with numbers 626, 629, 632, 640, 643, 646, 649, 657, 681, 682, 647, and 655. 
From: Laura 
Menninger 
Sent: Saturday, November 13, 2021 5:24 PM 
To: 
Cc: (USANYS) 
) 
cM> 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: questionnaires 
Hi 
;Jeff Pagliuca 
); 
Ann 
Lundberg <
Checking in. Do you have the compiled lists ready for us to review yet? 
-Laura 
From: 
Sent: Saturday, November 13, 2021 11:31 AM 
To: Laura 
Menninger 
Cc:

(USANYS) < 
Subject: RE: questionnaires 
Thanks, that's helpful. Attached is our list. 
From: Laura Menninger 
Sent: Saturday, November 13, 2021 12:45 PM 
To: 
I
*c>;

Jeff 
Pagliuca 
;Jeff Pagliuca 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: questionnaires 
EFTA00010218

Please let me know when you're ready to exchange the last batch of juror questionnaire positions. We have prepared 
ours in Excel this time and hope that will be easier for you to import. 
Thank you, 
Laura 
Laura A. Henninger I Partner 
Haddon, Morgan & Foreman, P.C. 
From: 
Sent: Friday, November 12, 2021 12:00 PM 
To: Laura Menninger Jeff Pagliuca 
Cc: (USANYS) 
c
e; 
Subject: questionnaires 
All, 
The prospective juror questionnaires completed today are available on USAfx. We will let you know when printed copies 
are available for pickup. If you could please send us your list of objections by tomorrow at 1 p.m., we can handle putting 
together the joint letter to the Court, in the same process as before. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00010219
